meanings.definition: A type of soup, typically made from shellfish
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious bisque at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The bisque at the fancy dinner party was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent3: The bisque was so good, it made me want to swim in the ocean!
meanings.sent4: Her bisque recipe was a treasure chest of flavors waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bisque filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of pottery that is unglazed and typically white
meanings.sent1: The artist displayed a beautiful bisque vase in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The bisque figurine on the shelf caught my eye with its simplicity.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally knocked over the bisque bowl, but luckily it didn't break.
meanings.sent4: The bisque teapot stood out among the colorful ceramics like a silent guardian.
meanings.sent5: The bisque plate had a smooth texture that felt soothing to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The sunset painted the sky in a lovely bisque hue.
meanings.sent2: She chose a bisque dress for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The bisque walls of the room gave it a warm and cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: The bisque flowers in the garden added a delicate touch to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The soft bisque glow of the evening sky was a sight to behold.
